title: English Listening-Speaking Competency Strengthening Program Using Dialogic Instructional Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: A collaborative learning environment focused on improving communication skills in various social contexts for working professionals.

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% listening comprehension in various social scenarios (meetings, presentations, daily conversations).
Learners apply over 30 new vocabulary/expressions per week to actual conversations through collaborative activities with peers.
Learners improve pronunciation and intonation accuracy by 40% through feedback-based conversational activities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
